name: Durham Terrace, Inc., Appellant, v. Hellertown Borough Authority
name_abbreviation: Durham Terrace, Inc. v. Hellertown Borough Authority

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBride, JJ.
parties: Durham Terrace, Inc., Appellant, v. Hellertown Borough Authority.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The decree is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Barthold, of the court below, reported at 16 Pa. D. & C. 2d 231.
Decree affirmed at appellant’s costs.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Daniel L. McCarthy, with him Justin Kevin McCarthy, for appellant.
L. F. McCarthy, with him McFacklen, JMslcin, McCarthy and Holland, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Durham Terrace, Inc., Appellant, v. Hellertown Borough Authority.
Argued January 5, 1959.
Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen and McBride, JJ.
March 16, 1959:
Daniel L. McCarthy, with him Justin Kevin McCarthy, for appellant.
L. F. McCarthy, with him McFacklen, JMslcin, McCarthy and Holland, for appellee.
